title: Ebert & Roeper - 05.11.08 - guest host Michael Phillips
description:
Ebert & Roeper  -  May 11th, 2008 - with guest host [url=http://www.chicagotribune.com/features/chi-michaelphillipscritic,1,931773.storygallery?coll=chi-entertainment-utl]Michael Phillips[/url], film critic for the Chicago Tribune

---- New movies this week:
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0811080/]Speed Racer[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0425308/]Noise[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0790623/]Meet Bill[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1033643/]What Happens in Vegas[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0460791/]The Fall[/url]

	--- Next Week
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0499448/]The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian[/url]
	--- Coming Soon
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0367882/]Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull[/url]
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1000774/]Sex and the City: The Movie[/url]

-------------------------------------------------
SPOILERS - The following list gives the thumbs up or thumbs down vote which the movies received.  (Phillips - Roeper)
-------------------------------------------------

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0811080/]Speed Racer[/url]  -  (an eye-full) up - (loved the look, style, spirt) up
-- from the Wachowski brothers - ( The Matrix - etc. )
-- Emile Hirsch - Matthew Fox - John Goodman - Susan Sarandon - Christina Ricci

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0425308/]Noise[/url]  -  down - down
-- Tim Robbins - William Hurt

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0790623/]Meet Bill[/url]  -  down - down
-- Aaron Eckhart - Jessica Alba - Elizabeth Banks - Timothy Olyphant - Kristen Wiig

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1033643/]What Happens in Vegas[/url]  -  down - down
-- Cameron Diaz - Ashton Kutcher - Queen Latifah

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0460791/]The Fall[/url]  -  down - down

	---Thumbs Up Video
		--Phillips:
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0020691/]The Big Trail[/url]  -  1930  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Big-Trail-Two-Disc-Special/dp/B0014BJ1A4/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1210644364&sr=1-1](amazon)[/url]
		--Roeper:
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0427309/]The Great Debaters[/url]  -  2007  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Great-Debaters-Denzel-Washington/dp/B00125WAWS/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1210644220&sr=1-1](amazon)[/url]
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/find?s=all&q=Indiana+Jones&x=17&y=5]Indiana Jones - The Adventure Collection[/url]  -  1981, 1984, 1989  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Indiana-Jones-Adventure-Collection-Editions/dp/B0014Z4ONE/ref=sr_1_3?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1210644241&sr=1-3](amazon)[/url]

	---NEW ON VIDEO
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0951216/]Mad Money[/url]  -  down - up
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0481797/]Youth Without Youth[/url]  -  (not quite) down - (for adventurous filmgoers) up

	---Roeper&#039;s Three to See (favorite movies currently in theaters)
		3 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0871426/]Baby Mama[/url]
		2 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0811080/]Speed Racer[/url]
		1 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0800039/]Forgetting Sarah Marshall[/url]

-------------------------------------------------
Siskel & Ebert and Ebert & Roeper video reviews dating back to 1985 can be found at [url=http://www.atthemoviestv.com/]atthemoviestv.com[/url]
Free [url=http://www.apple.com/podcasting/]Podcasts[/url] of Ebert & Roeper are available at the [url=http://www.apple.com/itunes/]iTunes Music Store[/url]
[url=http://www.rogerebert.com]Roger Ebert reviews[/url]
[url=http://www.suntimes.com/index/roeper.html]Richard Roeper columns[/url]
-------------------------------------------------
